### Percentage of individuals over 21 years

```{r 21 years or older}
percent_21_years <- round((mean(cleaned_nhanes_data$age >= 21)*100), 1)

gauge(percent_21_years, min = 0, max = 100, symbol = '%',
      gaugeSectors(colors = "black"))
```

### Percentage of individuals with average SBP above 120 mmHg
```{r}
high_avg_sbp <- round((mean(cleaned_nhanes_data$average_systolic > 120)*100), 2)
valueBox(high_avg_sbp, icon = "fa-user", color = "lightpink")
```
